metadata.title: CVE-2019-18888 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Symfony 2.8.0 through 2.8.50, 3.4.0 through3.4.34, 4.2.0 through 4.2.11, and 4.3.0 through 4.3.7. If an applicationpasses unvalidated user input as the file for which MIME type validationshould occur, then arbitrary arguments are passed to the underlying filecommand. This is related to symfony/http-foundation (and symfony/mime in4.3.x).

criterions.comment: symfony: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
